content.p: Choose the compatibility package for your version of Solr:

ol.li:
Remove the following files from your Solr installation:
contrib/clustering/lib/* (all files)
dist/apache-solr-clustering-*.jar (Solr clustering plugin JAR)
Copy the contents of the downloaded archive over the Solr home directory.
Start Solr with the solr.clustering.enabled system property set to true to enable the clustering plugin. Clustering should be performed by the updated Carrot2 algorithms.

div.p: Note: require Java Runtime Environment (version 1.6.0 or later).
